product_name: Patagonia Regular Rise Bootcut Jeans - Women's 32" Inseam - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Wear them for an afternoon of bushwacking and then an evening out with friends, the women's Patagonia Regular-Rise Bootcut jeans offer classic 5-pocket jeans styling with a 32 in. inseam. Jeans are made of organic cotton denim with stretch for fit and comfort. Fit is initially snug but then conforms to your body with wear. Wide contoured waistband with a zip-fly and 2-shank-button closure. Closeout.
short_description: Wear them for an afternoon of bushwacking and then an evening out with friends, the women's Patagonia Regular-Rise Bootcut jeans offer classic 5-pocket jeans styling with a 32 in. inseam.
